articles.description: In a groundbreaking study by researchers, led by Professor Christian Fankhauser, she found something interesting about how plants detect light.
articles.content: Despite lacking eyes or visual abilities, plants have an intriguing ability to sense the direction of light sources, which is crucial for their growth and energy production through photosynthesis. Fo… [+2381 chars]
